mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supplier_orders ( order_num, order_status, order_date, manager_id ) VALUES ( supplier_orders_seq.NEXTVAL, #{order_status}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{manager_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT inv_isbn, inv_title, inv_qty, inv_registration_date FROM inventory WHERE zone_num = #{zone_num}

SELECT cod.book_isbn AS book_isbn, SUM(cod.order_detail_qty) AS total_order_quantity, bk.book_name AS book_name, dr.request_date AS book_request_date FROM delivery_request dr LEFT JOIN delivery_request_detail drd ON dr.request_num = drd.request_num LEFT JOIN customer_orders co ON drd.order_num = co.order_num LEFT JOIN Customer_Order_Details cod ON co.order_num = cod.order_num LEFT JOIN Books bk ON bk.book_isbn = cod.book_isbn WHERE dr.request_num = #{request_num} AND dr.request_status = '01' GROUP BY cod.book_isbn, bk.book_name, dr.request_date
mapper.insert: MERGE INTO inventory inv USING ( SELECT #{book_isbn} AS inv_isbn, #{book_name} AS inv_title, #{total_order_quantity} AS inv_qty FROM dual ) src ON (inv.inv_isbn = src.inv_isbn) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET inv.inv_qty = inv.inv_qty - src.inv_qty WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (inv.inv_isbn, inv.inv_title, inv.inv_qty, inv.inv_registration_date) VALUES (src.inv_isbn, src.inv_title, src.inv_qty, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
